snippet.textDisplay:
Let's sum up the game, one injured before the game and then one injured during the game. Then 55 minutes at 14 against 15 with a referee not at the level. Provocation of the Scots and reaction of a player (normal red card). Two French actions 2 meters from the in-goal, then errors of hands and against Scots finishing in tries. Finally, a touch that is countered by France and then recovered with luck by the Scots.
 
In the end the worst have won and the best have lost because of themselves.The worst (the Scots) were able to outsmart the French, so congratulations to Scotland and a pity for having had such a bad referee.Bravo Scotland On va gagner contre les Irlandais
snippet.textOriginal:
Let's sum up the game, one injured before the game and then one injured during the game. Then 55 minutes at 14 against 15 with a referee not at the level. Provocation of the Scots and reaction of a player (normal red card). Two French actions 2 meters from the in-goal, then errors of hands and against Scots finishing in tries. Finally, a touch that is countered by France and then recovered with luck by the Scots.
 
In the end the worst have won and the best have lost because of themselves.The worst (the Scots) were able to outsmart the French, so congratulations to Scotland and a pity for having had such a bad referee.Bravo Scotland On va gagner contre les Irlandais

What a complete joke this tournament is. Cheaters.

snippet.textDisplay:
I am from Chengdu, China. I am a 15-year-old Chinese student.
I have been to France, the people are of low quality, the infrastructure is backward, and the technical facilities are backward. The store doesn't even have a QR code. This street is shabby. Wages are even lower than China
,I was serious. I've been to Paris and Nice in 2018 (my Givenchy baseball uniform was stolen near the Louvre), and there were even people robbing me. The streets of Paris are old and the buildings are short

snippet.textDisplay: France keep scoring own goals with their discipline. Same as that game against Wales in the World Cup, they had it in the bag but then their player elbowed someone in the face. He literally flushed a World Cup semi-final down the toilet for his team mates. I think the coach is letting these players get away with murder. He lets them sit out their suspension and then brings them right back into the squad. He should be dropping these guys for extended periods. Let the other squad members start realising how it will effect their career if they let their team down that badly.

snippet.textDisplay:
One of those days where everything goes wrong. Chat injured in the warm-up, Ntmak our playmaker out with a concussion after 5 minutes, that comical try by Mc Inally. But mostly I feel bad for Haouas. This was only his 4th cap, he gets poked in the eyes by Haining, then is taken out by Ritchie from behind, finally he retaliates and he is the one who gets sent off! Thank you TMO and scottish TV for choosing the replays very carefully..... I wish Haouas had kept his cool like Alun WynJones did the day before, but the guys who provoke, like Marler and Haining, deserve a long ban.

Screen grab for those who have not seen the eye gouging:
https://www.rugbyrama.fr/rugby/6-nations/2020/tournoi-des-6-nations-2020-mohamed-haouas-montpellier-circonstance-attenuante_sto7698007/story.shtml
snippet.textOriginal:
One of those days where everything goes wrong. Chat injured in the warm-up, Ntmak our playmaker out with a concussion after 5 minutes, that comical try by Mc Inally. But mostly I feel bad for Haouas. This was only his 4th cap, he gets poked in the eyes by Haining, then is taken out by Ritchie from behind, finally he retaliates and he is the one who gets sent off! Thank you TMO and scottish TV for choosing the replays very carefully..... I wish Haouas had kept his cool like Alun WynJones did the day before, but the guys who provoke, like Marler and Haining, deserve a long ban.

snippet.textDisplay:
Quit whining about the ref. The ref DIDN'T punch Ritchie, nor did he dump Gilchrist on his head. Nor did he get turned over countless times or lack creativity in attack.

Its easy to avoid ownership and simply blame the ref for a comfortable loss, but let's be honest, he got all of the major decisions pretty much bang on.

So if you wanna complain about other small details of the game that went against yous, well Brian Moore (an Englishman) was constantly pointing out how yous were offside and avoided getting penalised. Or how your hooker moved a metre left before throwing in line with his team mates. Or how your fly half was restarting play 5m inside the Scottish half.

And dumping a player on his head/neck is a red card offense. So yous probably should have had 2 red cards, instead of one.

Outclassed on the day, at least lose with class dignity. I was in Paris last year when we got pumped in the 6N by yous. France were miles better and we were terrible. Not the refs fault we lost.
snippet.textOriginal:
Quit whining about the ref. The ref DIDN'T punch Ritchie, nor did he dump Gilchrist on his head. Nor did he get turned over countless times or lack creativity in attack. 

Its easy to avoid ownership and simply blame the ref for a comfortable loss, but let's be honest, he got all of the major decisions pretty much bang on. 

So if you wanna complain about other small details of the game that went against yous, well Brian Moore (an Englishman) was constantly pointing out how yous were offside and avoided getting penalised. Or how your hooker moved a metre left before throwing in line with his team mates. Or how your fly half was restarting play 5m inside the Scottish half. 

And dumping a player on his head/neck is a red card offense. So yous probably should have had 2 red cards, instead of one. 

Outclassed on the day, at least lose with class dignity. I was in Paris last year when we got pumped in the 6N by yous. France were miles better and we were terrible. Not the refs fault we lost.

snippet.textDisplay:
Putain... On peut dire ce qu'on veut mais on a été pris tactiquement et on a été mauvais. Et à 15 on aurait pu gagner peut-être mais pas à 14...
Le carton rouge est mérité, on peut regretter que le 6 anglais n'ait pas pris un carton lui aussi. Bref, c'est comme ça ils ont mérité la victoire, on a eu des temps forts mais la défense écossaise nous a bien maîtrisé, et ils ont été bon dans les rucks, l'agressivité, jeu au pied.
Notre charnière n'a pas été performante derrière un pack chahuté. On a été sous pression dès le début.
Un scénario de match à l'ancienne, avec une dramaturgie comme seul le rugby nous en donne !
Bravo Scotland, good game !
🇫🇷

Notre charnière n'a pas été performante derrière un pack chahuté. On a été sous pression dès le début. 
Un scénario de match à l'ancienne, avec une dramaturgie comme seul le rugby nous en donne ! 
Bravo Scotland, good game !
🇫🇷

snippet.textDisplay:
So lads, barring the questionable officiating, well done Scotland regardless you did play the better game, respect... French fans, guys keep your heads up. You're still in, this has been a huge step up since last year plus you've beaten England and Wales, if you manage Ireland, that's an insane achievement in the Six nations.
Looking to the future, Wales or Scotland for fourth? And Ireland/England/France for the '20 Championship? Who have we got?

snippet.textDisplay: The French fought despite their inferiorities (14 vs 16), the referee is British, so it's normal that the grand slam is difficult. The red card was deserved, but a Scot should also have taken one. I am French and I say congratulations to Scotland, you have a beautiful and fast team. We French are happy to see a French team reborn after difficult years. The French team is young, and needs to progress. France was favourite, now I hope with all my heart that England lose to Italy (lol), and that France beat Ireland. Let the best team win this tournament. ☮️
snippet.textOriginal: The French fought despite their inferiorities (14 vs 16), the referee is British, so it's normal that the grand slam is difficult. The red card was deserved, but a Scot should also have taken one. I am French and I say congratulations to Scotland, you have a beautiful and fast team. We French are happy to see a French team reborn after difficult years. The French team is young, and needs to progress. France was favourite, now I hope with all my heart that England lose to Italy (lol), and that France beat Ireland. Let the best team win this tournament. ☮️

snippet.textDisplay: Scotland will still finish in their normal 5th position.

snippet.textDisplay: Congrats Scotland, you outplayed us (well the French team lol) today, you were the better side on the field. I think anything else (injuries, yellow and red cards) is a consequence of this. I am still very proud of this young French team and talented players who are still on the learning curve (Haouas with a bit more experience would have gone to the ground after receiving fingers in the eyes instead of replying with a punch in the face ;) ). Looking forward to next Saturday against Ireland, and to the following months and years... finally some bright future for Les Bleus! :)

snippet.textDisplay: I am french and I always loved the Scots. Now i repeat : congratulations Scotland; you were so close vs England or Ireland. Happy for you.

snippet.textDisplay: A big thank you to Scotland for opening the door to a 6 Nations title for England this season.  The Scots played their best game in quite some time and were good value for a convincing win.  Really thought this was France's year...but it now seems unlikely!

snippet.textDisplay: How to shoot yourself in the foot, groin, stomach, chest and head all at the same time - don't control your temper when you so obviously are getting baited! No losing bonus point, England beat Scotland so now it's even Stevens. England have a much easier match against Italy ( if it ever comes to pass, France should hope not!), Ireland are going to be a very tough cookie to crack. Temper, temper, temper. Lessons not learned in the World Cup.
snippet.textOriginal: How to shoot yourself in the foot, groin, stomach, chest and head all at the same time - don't control your temper when you so obviously are getting baited! England have a much easier match against Italy ( if it ever comes to pass, France should hope not!), Ireland are going to be a very tough cookie to crack. Temper, temper, temper. snippet.textDisplay:
J’ai une idée.. on donne la coupe aux Anglais et on joue les matchs après. C’est plus simple pour tout le monde et ça permettra de voir des vrais match plutôt que ce sketch que je viens de voir cet après-midi.. les écossais toujours hors jeux et JAMAIS sanctionné, quand au rouge, si tu continues la vidéo tu peux en virer deux des écossais !! Surtout que le coup de sang viens d’eux au départ... et bien sûr pas sanctionné.. et l’arbitre qui ne revient pas sur l’avantage alors qu’on est devant les poteaux... et le bouquet final.. quand l’arbitre demande à la vidéo s’il peut encore siffler une énième pénalité pour les écossais alors que le match est fini.. deux minutes de plus et il sifflait penalty pour Lyon !!
Ras le bol de voir mon sport devenir pourri comme le foot alors oui, les écossais on fait un gros match, mais pour moi c’est totalement effacé par un arbitrage pro-british.. le gars va toucher son chèque par les roosbeefs et voilà... fin du suspense les gars on connaît la suite
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: I support Scotland for over eighteen years now and I congrats them for a deserving victory. But. When you ref a match, make sure that you ref all the actions. So Jamie Ritchie (number 6) can punch Mohamed Haouas to the face (number 3) at 0:44 without receving a yellow or a red card ? Come on. No offense, even if the French team were terribly bad during that match. I'm just saying, 'cause it's a little bit the turning point of the match, in my opinion. Anyway, congrats Scotland.
snippet.textOriginal: I support Scotland for over eighteen years now and I congrats them for a deserving victory. But. When you ref a match, make sure that you ref all the actions. So Jamie Ritchie (number 6) can punch Mohamed Haouas to the face (number 3) at 0:44 without receving a yellow or a red card ? Come on. No offense, even if the French team were terribly bad during that match. I'm just saying, 'cause it's a little bit the turning point of the match, in my opinion. Anyway, congrats Scotland.

snippet.textDisplay: .. pretty much every new ref this year has been just a whistle blower maniac .no flow to the games .just arm out by the ref.. lately its a game of refs .where it should be a game for the players.. the ref just stops it.... change the soft penalties to a free-kick thatl be a good start ..one team can score 3 tries the other team none but can still win because easy penalties given away... one guy accidentally steps over the offside mark steps back .nowhere near the play doesnt matter refs arm out ""penalty""  ..its spoiling the game we love...id rather a game without 3 points itl make teams wanting to score a try more.. how about any penalty must be kicked from half way line ..something to ge the games flowing again like the 70s- 80s where rugby was rugby

snippet.textDisplay: As always, we are f...ed up by the referees. The Britishs don't want our presence in this tournament. Ok, the red card is not illogical; the pb is that never the referee gives penalties against the opponent. For instance, why the Scottish player doesn't receive a yellow card after slapping the french player ? No slap, no punch, no red card. I am fed up with this unfair way to referee. It is clear that we are not welcome here. I would prefer my team leave the 6 nations tournament. In France we accept to be beaten by the strongest team but not by the referees.

snippet.textDisplay:
Le geste de Haouas est impardonnable. Il faut savoir garder son sang froid en rugby international !
La FFR doit être intraitable face à ce type d'acte. On ne veut plus voir nos matchs volés par des dérapages individuels !
snippet.textOriginal:
Le geste de Haouas est impardonnable. Il faut savoir garder son sang froid en rugby international !

snippet.textDisplay:
Bon l'arbitrage était limite à certains moments. Certaines actions auraient selon moi mérité recompenses.

On peut aussi contester le fait que l'arbitre s'intéresse seulement au coup de poing de Haouas et non pas au début de la bagarre. Un rouge pour Haouas et un jaune pour l'écossais n'aurait pas été volé. Ils étaient médiocre ces écossais. Sur la seule action offensive que nous avons nous faisons un essai. C'est frustrant mais un manque de chance et des événements imprévus nous ont poussé à la défaite.
C'est maintenant qu'on verra les vrais supporters. Ceux qui retourneront leurs vestes et ceux qui continueront de supporter notre équipe.
On ne peut pas gagner tous les match fallait bien que ça arrive à un moment. Dommage que ça soit celui ci.
Je suis convaincu qu'on gagnera le match face à l'Irlande ! 🇨🇵🔥💪🏻

Je suis convaincu qu'on gagnera le match face à l'Irlande ! 🇨🇵🔥💪🏻
